content: अवीर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Unmanly, effeminate, cowardly. {@--2@} Having no son (as a woman). {@--3@} Helpless. {@--4@} Destitute of men. --रा A woman who has neither sons nor husband; अजातपुत्रा विधवा साऽवीरा परिकीर्तिता; (<ab>opp.</ab> वीरा which is thus defined; पतिपुत्रवती नारी वीरा प्रोक्ता मनीषिभिः); अनर्चितं वृथा मांसमवीरांयाश्च योषितः <ls>Ms. 4. 213</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 163.</ls>
